fields.name: Core Educational Activities
fields.description: Processing student data for enrollment, class assignments, academic records, examinations, report cards, and attendance tracking. This is essential for providing educational services and cannot be withdrawn.
fields.legal_basis: Essential for fulfilling the educational contract between school and parent/guardian. Required under Right to Education Act, 2009.

fields.name: Health & Safety Records
fields.description: Storing health records, medical conditions, allergies, vaccination records, and emergency contact information to ensure student safety and well-being during school hours.
fields.legal_basis: Legal obligation under Disaster Management Act, 2005 and duty of care to ensure student safety. Required for emergency response.

fields.name: Communication & Notices
fields.description: Sending emails, SMS, and app notifications for school notices, event updates, academic communications, holiday announcements, and parent-teacher meeting schedules.
fields.legal_basis: Legitimate interest in keeping parents informed about school activities. Parents may opt-out and choose alternative communication methods.

fields.name: Fee Management & Financial Processing
fields.description: Processing fee payments, generating invoices, tracking financial transactions, payment reminders, and maintaining fee payment history for accounting purposes.
fields.legal_basis: Contractual obligation for fee collection and legal requirement under Income Tax Act, 1961 for financial record retention (7 years).

fields.name: Attendance Tracking & Monitoring
fields.description: Recording daily attendance, tracking absence patterns, generating attendance reports, and monitoring punctuality for academic assessment and safety purposes.
fields.legal_basis: Educational necessity under Right to Education Act and safety monitoring requirement. Essential for tracking student presence on campus.

fields.name: Behavioral Monitoring & Development Notes
fields.description: Recording behavioral incidents, achievements, developmental observations, disciplinary actions, and teacher remarks for student development and counseling purposes.
fields.legal_basis: Educational development and student welfare. Helps track behavioral patterns and provide appropriate counseling support.

fields.name: Photo & Media Storage
fields.description: Storing student photographs for ID cards, school records, yearbooks, website galleries, and promotional materials. Photos may be used in school publications and events.
fields.legal_basis: Administrative convenience for identification purposes. Parents may decline photo usage in public materials while allowing ID card photos.

fields.name: Analytics & System Improvement
fields.description: Analyzing academic performance trends, attendance patterns, usage statistics, and system performance data to improve educational outcomes and optimize school operations.
fields.legal_basis: Legitimate interest in improving educational services and system efficiency. Data is anonymized where possible for trend analysis.

fields.name: Third-Party SMS Service (Twilio)
fields.description: Sharing phone numbers with Twilio SMS service for sending text notifications about attendance, fee reminders, exam schedules, and emergency alerts.
fields.legal_basis: Service delivery via authorized vendor with Data Processing Agreement. Twilio processes data only as per our instructions.

fields.name: Third-Party Payment Gateway (Razorpay/PayU/Stripe)
fields.description: Sharing payment details with payment gateway providers (Razorpay, PayU, Stripe) for processing online fee payments securely. Payment data is tokenized and encrypted.
fields.legal_basis: Service delivery via PCI-DSS compliant payment processors. Required for online payment processing with Data Processing Agreements in place.
